name: iDots (Game)
description:
iDots is a classic pen & paper game (also known as Dots and Boxes, or Square-it).

Starting with a grid of dots, 2-4 players take turns drawing lines between adjacent dots. A player who draws a line that forms a square earns a point and gets another turn. The game ends when no more adjacent dots can be connected, and the winner is the person with the most points.

FEATURES:

- A fun and colorful theme that's easy on the eyes and appealing.

- Single player mode against 2-3 computer players.

- Multiplayer mode between 2-4 players (on same device).

- Interactive tutorial mode for beginners to this game.

- Adjustable game speed.

- English and Arabic user interface languages.


Please feel free to contribute your feedback. Any concerns, suggestions and criticisms are welcome.
